objective.para: Creative and technical project coordinator and travel writer, interested and experienced in web development

description.para: Managed special projects related to internal training and events for 5 SVPs in my division.
Created marketing materials such as postcards and flyers for our 50 brokers.Analyzed Small Business Administration loan packages to ensure compliance with underwriting SOP.

degree.annotation: Learned full-stack web development by attending a full time, 3 month program, building multiple web apps, and completing daily coding challenges.
Publishing and Design focus. Lead Designer and Associate Editor of Knock Journal, a 500 run, nationally distributed literary journal.

skillset.skill: HTML, CSS, Salesforce, SharePoint, Siebel, Lotus Notes, Box, JavaScript, Ruby on Rails, Angular, jQuery, NodeJS, Express, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Heroku, GitHub/Git, pair programming, Bootstrap, Adobe Indesign
